ModMetaData.name: Cobblestone Floors (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Update of BaconBits mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=25580.msg260005#msg260005
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/CobblestoneFloors
--- Original Description --- Adds a cobblestone floor that is built from loose stones on the ground at no cost. Like we had back in A13.
